Question
========
Which statement about R<sup>2</sup> is **right**?

Answerlist
----------
* R<sup>2</sup> = 1 if the B coefficients of all the independent variables in the regression model have the value 0.
* The value of R<sup>2</sup>is always between -1 and 1.
* R<sup>2</sup> = 1 if the regression model has no prediction error ('prediction error').
* R<sup>2</sup> = 0 if there is no correlation between all the independent variables in the regression model.
